DOC.brief_summary: Can software develop automatically aid measurement abdominal aortic aneurysm , way predict future rupture growth abdominal aortic aneurysm .
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis : ECG-gated multidetector CT ECG-gated Dual Source CT use create multiple volumetric datasets abdominal aorta time period cardiac cycle , allow direct regional calculation abdominal aortic distensibility entire volume abdominal aorta , provide insight risk abdominal aortic aneurysm rupture early large vessel stiffness .
DOC.criteria: AAA must least 3 cm maximum 4.9cm crosssectional diameter . BMI 31 less . Creatinine result < 2.0 within six month prior scan . US patient must normal creatinine ( 0.9 1.4 ) one year study visit . Patients originally schedule US , subsequently roll study , ultrasound scan followup initial CTA . Creatinine > 2.0 . Creatinine < 0.9 > 1.4 schedule US . Atrial fibrillation arrythmia . Known AAA great 5 cm size . Allergy contrast dye .
